Web Safe Fonts

May 11, 2012 â€¢ Thanos

We have talked before about using fonts in your html email templates. Custom fonts are not ESP friendly, so we have to play with the web-safe fonts.

Below is a list of these fonts that will always display correctly in your email.

  • Verdana
  • Arial
  • Helvetica
  • Comic Sans
  • Impact
  • Tahoma
  • Trebuchet
  • Courier New
  • Lucida Console

If you really want to use custom special typography, you have to do it through static images.
